Translations.Text: Eezzbet i Win ikwen Ixelqen, kunwi akked isuta imenza
Nnan: "kecc, aql ak kan, seg ioehbaniyen
Kecc, d amdan kan, am nekwni. Neesb ik seg wid iskiddiben
Sse$li d fellane$ igezman igenni, ma d tidep ay tessawalev
Inna: "Mass iw Ieoa, sennig wiyav, ayen txeddmem
Skaddben t. Iwwet iten uaaqeb, deg wass n tillas. D aaaqeb, s tidep, n wass abarar
Deg wayagi, d assekni, war ccekk. Tegwti degsen, ur llin d lmumnin
Mass ik, s tidep, ar Neppa d Uzmir, Ipeunu
Ar wagi, war ccekk, d ayen id Issers Mass imavalen
Irs ed, yides, ooue n laman
ef wul ik, iwakken a ppiliv seg wid inedoen
s umeslay aaoab ipbegginen
Neppa, s tidep, deg Ihellilen imezwura
Day ur illi ara d assekni i nitni, mi t ssnen imusnawen n At Isoail
Lemmer it id Nessers, i yiwen seg ibeooaniyen
u i$oa yasen t, ur ppamnen yis
Akka, Nessawev it ar wulawen ibe$wviyen
Ur ppamnen yis, alamma walan aaaqeb aqeoean
A ten id ias, deqzalla, nitni ur bnin
Ad inin: "amendeo ma neggani
Day earen s aaaqeb nneÂ£
Day ur twalav ara, N$at iten, d iseggwasen
Sinna, iusa ten id wayen i sen ippuwaaaden
